website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive set for both your skis and boots. Just keep in mind that neither are padded.
pros: Water-resistant and built to be carried
Many owners were able to fit more than one pair of skis in the bag and boots as well as a helmet in the boot bag
cons: It is advertised to carry 200 cm skis but owners struggled to fit anything over 185 cm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought on the basis of other reviews. I am VERY pleased with the value of these products. My 180cm skis fit in with plenty of room for my poles and ski pants. I folded the end over and buckled it for a nice, neat fit. My 28.5 boots fit in nicely. Have not tried to include helmet ... That would be tight AND and unexpected bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sheamus O

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Skis...
customer_reviews.text: Ski/Kite Case...this is a muti-use combination case set. We use it for storage of 7-TRICK KITES, not skis. Everything is contained within and nothing left behind when heading out to fly our kites. The material is very strong and stiching is very good quality to hold heavy skis as intended. There are 2 securing straps to 'bundle' your contents tight together; limiting movement within. The bottom end can be folded over and secured for shorter skis/contents. We can verify the material is dust and water resistant as we carry it outdoors in a truck. This case should provide years of use, depending on how its handled of course. Glad we made this selection/purchase and I'm sure you will be also.
customer_reviews.author: Don Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality and ample size.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are sturdy and a good value, but they are pretty roomy. My kids only ski classic X-country, so they each have only one pair of skis and I could easily have gotten away with one bag for the two of them. For people that also have skate skis, this bag is plenty large for both pairs of skis, poles, wax, mittens, scarves, hats, etc...Solid quality and ample size. I'm guessing they would be plenty large enough for downhill skis and poles, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I would have bought a bag with wheels instead
customer_reviews.text: the bag is big for one set but small for two sets of skis. Not sure why they didn't make it large enough for two or just small enough for one. In hindsight I would have bought a bag with wheels. The zipper is a little bit cheap. Also, I should not have bought a separate bag for my boots because I put them in my suitcase anyhow because I don't want that many carry-ons for the airplane.
customer_reviews.author: spearing

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product!  Both the Boot Bag and the Ski Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the delivery, quality, and craftsmanship of this soft ski bag and boot bag. I needed something not for holding ski's but for holding a waterski barefoot boom. Years ago when I bought my boom, the boom bags were well over $100, and I realized that my soft sided snow ski bag would be up to the task. For a fraction of the cost I have something that will work even better! I will keep these folks in mind in the future both for snow and waterski gear!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawntreader77

customer_reviews.title: Very well made at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an initial review as I just received the product and have not had the opportunity to put it to use. That said, the product is exactly as described in fit, finish, design, size and materials. It appears to be extremely well made and I’m confident that it will last for many years and road trips. I am truly astounded at the quality for the price and am in no way disappointed with the product. I intend to add too and or write another review after using it next season. My rating is 4 out of 5 stars because I’ve yet to use it and feel like I cannot rate the final star until I do.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great ski bag, prompt service
customer_reviews.text: I am LOVE my new ski bag --I got the black with the pink trim, which stands out in the baggage pick up area and is reallyt cute, too. They arrived promptly, two days before I was scheduled to leave, so I didn't fret at all about them making it. Both my skate skis and my roller skis fit into it, and it will hold downhill skis, no problem. I like the foldover top, so the skis don't slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 Pairs of Nordic Skis w/ Poles
customer_reviews.text: I fit two pairs of Nordic skis (195 cm) with poles in here to fly with and there is still a lot of room (can fit a third skinny pair, but depends on type of Nordic skis). The ski bag is wide at the ends so super curved skis fit easily with extra gear/padding. The boot bag can fit several pairs of Nordic boots plus whatever else you need--still extra space. Both full bags together are still under 20 lbs, and Southwest just has a 50 lbs limit. Really happy with it; no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Attention to details is lacking
customer_reviews.text: -- either that, or I seriously misunderstand how it works. Plastic buckle at the top of the bag that is used for length adjustment is not symmetrical -- it can only be clipped one way. Unfortunately, the way it's sewn on to the straps means that when the bag top is rolled and the buckle is clipped to hold it, the buckle stands at 90 degrees to the surface of the bag instead of lying flat against it. One side of the buckle seems to be attached upside-down, and because it is not symmetrical, both straps end up twisted quarter-turn, and the buckle stands on its edge. What am I missing?
customer_reviews.author: YDG

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Skyboxes
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this product. I have five of them for ski transport in a large Yak Skybox. It is essential to keep your skis from sliding around too much. I would not hesitate to use these for air travel once in a while, however, if your looking for a solution for checking your ski for frequent air travel I would recommend a more heavy duty product. For the price and my requirements, this product is superb.
customer_reviews.author: IowaDrifter

customer_reviews.title: Great value I use it for all of my photograhy light stands and soft boxes
customer_reviews.text: Great price and value. I needed a long storage and transport bag to carry my photography light stands, folding light boxes, tripods, AC cables, and misc long lighting gear. I store in this bag: 4 light stands, 2 (24 inch) folding soft boxes, 2 (15 feet extension cords), 1 reflector stand, an diffuse umbrella, and misc adapters etc... This bag holds everything I need and stores up and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Just get this, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought new ski bag combo for new skis, and these are way better than old ones. Quality of build is about the same, but it's the little things like straps, bag shoulder strap, etc. that make it much easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great set - great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 11 yr old daughters skis and boots. Actually impressed with the look and quality when she put them together. They look good and keep everything together. She can fit her boots, helmet, googles, gloves, etc in the bag and skis and poles (150) in the ski bag with plenty of room to spare but probably not enough for 2 sets of skis (smaller, maybe) Are these going to last a decade? Probably not but you should get through a few seasons which matches the price perfectly. I would recommend these, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: David Laubner

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get my new skiis from FL to our condo in Utah. I wanted to make sure the skis were protected but since I wasn’t going to be taking them back and forth a bunch I opted for this non padded set! It worked perfect! Wrapped the bindings and tips still had room to throw a few clothing items in as well, boots fit perfect in the boot bag! Great set! Was very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Britt M. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Will fits 2 skis and poles in any length of skis.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a inexpensive case yet it is durable and well thought designs. My alpine and nordic skis and 2 sets of poles will easily fit in one bag. Length of the bag is much longer than any skis and you can hold the top and buckle down for length to be adjusted. I am happy that I did not spend $300 for the case from local ski shop.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Product was as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Product was as advertised. I'm using it for xc skiing. Ski bag will hold two pairs of skiis and poles. The boot bag holds two pairs of boots and my size 50 (eur) boots fit easily.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adequate, given the price
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, for the price, you really can't complain! It gets the job done. Materials seem a bit thin and there's no padding, so keep that in mind if you choose to check it as luggage on a flight, but realistically your equipment should be hardy enough to survive without padding. All in all, no complaints. Some customers have complained that things rip/tear somewhat easily, but so far I haven't had any issues. I'll update this review if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Zak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality and the color of the bags. I ordered the bags in blue. The ski bag fit my skis perfectly, and I really like the way you can shorter the bag to exactly meet the length of the skis. The boot bag is really roomy, and I'm able to fit my ski pants, gloves, gator, etc. in it. Would highly recommend this set of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Worked Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long bag to keep parts of a display shelf I cart around for shows, and after a little research, this seemed to fit the bill. I ordered it, got one-day shipping and got it a day before the show. Everything and more fit in there just right, so I was able to carry the shelf parts around without dinging/scratching anything! And the boot bag worked for extra items I wanted to take along, so it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mark from Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to other bags.
customer_reviews.text: I like the price. I like that it comes with a boot/gear bag. Excellent ski bag for storing skis for travel. Seems durable. I've had people ask about it already. Great alternative if you want to spend your money on other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a birthday gift for my husband. He loved it! Only issue was, it didn't come with instructions so we had to look at the product picture on Amazon to figure out how to adjust the length of the bag. But we figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: The dancer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality do not like the ski boots bag
customer_reviews.text: It would be really great ski and ski boots bag set, but I do not like the ski boots bag because it is not a backpack. it is heavy to carry ski boots in that bag on one shoulder. So I returned it ang got ski boots backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Carrot

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good value
customer_reviews.text: My son has only used for a couple of weeks but seems to be a good value. Appears to be well made; will have to see how it holds up over time. Great to get both the ski and boot bags for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to store ski equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This was our second purchase of this set. My review from last year holds: this year I bought the bags again for my daughter. Perfect price for storage. My Son has his skis stored at school with his helmet and boots and this was a perfect way to tag them. I bought Luggage Grips in order to identify his bags. Perfect for storing skis in the summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to replace Photography background stand bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. Nice size. I'm using it to hold a photography background stand plus an extra tripod. It all fits with a little room to spare. Hard to find a bag long enough without paying an arm and a leg, this bag does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Kosinski

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag
customer_reviews.text: We don't use this bag for skis, but rather to carry a display rack. This bag is clearly strong and thick, so I have good reason to believe it will last a long time. I liked that the zipper had a covering to hide the zipper pulls to avoid them being damaged or coming apart... nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to anyone who plans on more than one ...
customer_reviews.text: The strap attachment on the boot bag broke on its first trip. Skis managed to cut through the thin fabric on the ski bag on the second international flight. Frankly, I would not recommend this to anyone who plans on more than one trip with their gear using this product.
customer_reviews.author: William J Wattie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit 2 racetigers
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality bag that feels like it will last forever. However, it does not fit my 2 skis. I have a pair of volkl sl racetigers (155 cm) and a pair of volkl gs racetigers (166cm) and they don’t fit together. I’ve tried every which way to fit them but it just doesn’t work. I think it would fit two all mountain skis because they have smaller bindings but my skis have bigger bindings and they don’t fit. I included pictures because I think it gives you a better idea how they look irl but I don’t have a picture of my two skis together because they scratched each other.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing for its low price point. The bag for the skis can adjust to fit all sizes of skis which is great. The additional bag easily held my boots, helmet, goggles, camera, and whatever other things I threw in there.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for storing skis to protect from getting dirty...if youre looking to fly though you would need to add insulation like bubble wrap around the skis. I am very happy with this...i wanted something to store them in and for easy transport when going on ski trips
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems sturdy but the 200cm skis were a VERY tight fit. I am using the bag to store my son's skis in my basement. If I were using it to transport skis to and from a slope, I would return the bag as it takes too long to fit the skis in the bag and get them out again.
customer_reviews.author: NJWoman

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to see the quality of both bags, ski and boots, for the minimum price I had to pay. Having lost my boot bag and buying a pair of Nordic skis to go along with my Alpine set, I needed both. The material is thicker and zippers sturdier than the bags I had before. The ski bag length was just right for my 75" Nordic skiis and the boot bag had plenty of room for my size 13 Nordic ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY W SARZOTTI

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a Ski and Boot Bag combo
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, Boot Bag fits boots, gloves, pants and helmet. Not padded so might not work great if you have to take a flight to ski, but so far great product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy B

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, but effective
customer_reviews.text: Using the long case for pipe and drape pole transportation. After about a dozen uses, the zippers aren't fairing well and the top buckle that rolls the bag down has ripped out. It's not heavy use nor is the gear handled rough, but it works. The bag is surprisingly big in how much it can carry. The carrying handles do seem slightly long.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Good value plenty of room can probably fit kids skies in there as well but definitely not 2 adult skies. I packed the skies, boots, and most of my cloths in these
customer_reviews.author: Max Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Usefulness of upper tie down strap is questionable
customer_reviews.text: The ski bag is as advertised but contains one major flaw. Oneof the tie down cinch straps does not adjust tight against the skis inside the bag. At it's tightest point it hangs loose so it does not secure the skis well within the bag. In order to make it work one must tie the hanging left over strap in a rope type knot defeating the purpose of using the strap's buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Three trips with two sets of skis is as long as this lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to take his race skis with him. I was trying to svoid spending too much money and unfortunately got what I paid for. After three trips there’s a big hole in the material.
customer_reviews.author: D. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure what to expect for the price but I have been pleasantly surprised. The bag fits my skis and seems durable enough for light transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Too Thin
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this bag set. It was lined well and was fairly secure. Very, very thin though. Used it only once with one pair of skis and there were already deep scuffs on the ski bag and a hole straight through the boot bag. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dehne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bags 100%
customer_reviews.text: I do cross country skiing and was always in need of a bag and this fully met my expectations! I also love the boot bag to carry my different boots for racing 👍
customer_reviews.author: Eryn Field

customer_reviews.title: snaps that buckle it together are cheap but good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: O would buy again as good value for the money but the buckles are cheap so that is why I graded aveage
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Love the products
customer_reviews.text: Love the products! I was impressed with the quality considering the price. Size of the ski bad can be adjusted to fit shorter length skis. My skis, poles and my 5-year old skis fit in the bag easily. Good quality ski boots bag as well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria2112

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this to store skis and boots and seems to work fine. Customer care may want to take a better look at their product, as there was dirt on both the ski bag and boot bag when I took it out of the packaging. Given it is going into storage I don't really care, but other probably would.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzo

customer_reviews.title: Athletico ski bag and boot combo.
customer_reviews.text: great quality for the price. Bag is plenty big enough to 2 sets of skis, and will fit almost any length. The boot bag is also quite roomy. Seems to be nice quality. Zippers work smooth. have a very durable feel to them. We will see when ski season arrives in New England.
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as mentioned. Long for long skis too
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for pair of skis and poles in main bag. Boot bag for my ski boots and more
customer_reviews.author: mcmsavers

customer_reviews.title: Great ski bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't used my new ski bag yet I can say it is well made and plenty long enough for my skis. The boot bag has plenty of room for my boots and helmet...probably my lunch and extra ski clothes too. Looking forward to a great ski season using the local bus to transport me to the slopes!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Yadon

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ski bag was not as long as advertised, resulting in skis that should fit, not fitting. If your skis are of a length close to the length advertised (within ~4"), find a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Evalex

customer_reviews.title: Love this ski bag set and what a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this ski bag set and what a great price. Plenty of room for 2 sets of skis and boots as well as extra gear.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, basic bags.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing wrong with this set but you get what you pay for. Boot bag is just a squat shaped bag- no center chamber for helmet, gloves, etc Again, nothing wrong with this at all for the money and I was looking for something cheap to ship my daughters skis and boots across the country to her, but don't expect much.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Product came in better than described. I’m not using it for skis, but for other long material. And as a carry bag it works well. Although they show different colors in the photo, don’t know how to order those.
customer_reviews.author: brendan p kelso

customer_reviews.title: It made her items easy to identify and secure
customer_reviews.text: Used it to send my 11 year old to weekly ski school on the ski bus. It made her items easy to identify and secure. I think the price was great and it will be used next season as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive ski/snowboard luggage solution.
customer_reviews.text: Works as adversities and is very inexpensive. Will be using for many years to come. Lack of padding is annoying but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for the price point. Boot bag actually holds in the water that my boots left over. Lots of room in the boot bag as well. I put my skit pants and coat in there on the trip up!
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality suitable for travel although I only wanted this to store my gear and transport it to and from the slopes .
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: works fine but aesthetic issues due to Inconsistent stitching patterns. Notified company and the response I received was that they will notify their manufacturer. Is that the best they can do? Well, if it is then I would suggest you shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great ski storage bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags were exactly what I wanted. They are perfect for ski/boot storage. Excellent seller.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! I was a little skeptical that I could purchase a high quality ski bag and boot case but this product exceeded my expectations! The bag is lightweight and has fasteners to keep you skis in place. I ski out of boundraries so I needed a lightweight back I could hike with then easily fold up and put in my CamelBak as I ski down, this is the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, holds well after 5 trips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my skies, used 5 times during this winter for transporting them in a bag on top the the roof rack. So far they hold well. The material looks strong and I believe will last for long time. Bought another bag for my wife skies.
customer_reviews.author: AlexF

customer_reviews.title: I like the ski bag with the waterproofing on the liner
customer_reviews.text: This replaces ski and boot bags that I have had for 25 years; it was time. I like the ski bag with the waterproofing on the liner; I can now put away the skis while still wet and not get water all over the cargo area of my SUV. The boot bag seems fine but it is not big enough to fit my helmet or any other gear. So far, I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: manzanita

customer_reviews.title: High Quality. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my skis and ski boots perfectly, and much room for my gloves, poles, socks, and other small items can be stored in these bags. Although these are nice for storage, I’d reccomend buying the Athletico padded bag for ski trips (especially if the skis will be placed in a luggage compartment).
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Size and value
customer_reviews.text: The Athletico ski bag easily fits two pairs of skis 2 prs of poles-my 177cm Blizzard Cochise's and my wife's 169cm Blizzard Black Pearls--great value and saves us a ton on those nasty baggage fees from the airlines. Can't comment on their durability or the sturdiness at this time but the shell appears rugged enough to handle anything
customer_reviews.author: Donald H Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Very decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a little while now and I really like it. I was skeptical buying at first because it is so cheap for a ski bag and boot bag together but it has really held up. There is plenty of room in both bags for other things and they’re easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Boot Bag a bit small but great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this same set...just a different color as I had bought one for myself and now just bought for my son. Good quality, padded. Seller is efficient
customer_reviews.author: tf6869

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend so have not used them but they are really nice bags for the money and I know she is going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for boots with plenty of room for extra items
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for boots with plenty of room for extra items. Skis & poles fit with plenty of extra room too. I like the roll down feature on the ski bag
customer_reviews.author: Greg T

customer_reviews.title: Good for your money
customer_reviews.text: Very good for your money , material is OK, not that thick , but does job, boot bag fits my Salomon boots , Satisfy
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan Kulynych

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this to transport a pop up wall and frame for art shows. Works great! Made it flying cross country with no tears while full of metal pipes and pieces! Not sure if it would hold up day in and day out but for the price it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Artists who wonder how to transport rolls of paintings should get this product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to transport rolls of canvas, works of art which will go in cargo. It works perfectly. You don’t need to be a skier to such a great pair of bag. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: While I have not taken the Athletico Two Piece Ski and Boot Bag out on the trail yet, my skis, poles and boots fit well and the roll down feature worked well and secured the shorter skis and poles in the bag. I am sure I will now more easily transport my skis from car to trail which I welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag !
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my first pair of skies and for the price I wasn’t expecting a lot and I was surprised once I saw it. Sturdy enough, looks great and it’s easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and as described. I don't have much to review at this time as it is still in the box and will be given as an xmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding skis/boots!
customer_reviews.text: These hold my skis and boots great! Very easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Damiteyeo

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: Great product for traveling, though got a hole in it the first time it was shipped, probably due to rough handling, and it didn't affect the use of the bag at all. its quite a bit longer than I expected which is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality material and zippers and handles hold together well
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality material and zippers and handles hold together well. For the price I can't find anything comparable. I am grabbing one for my wife too..
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Peary

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Like that you can roll down to fit the length of the skis. Not a padded bag, but I was only looking for something to make carrying skis easier.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Durable and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The boot bag holds boots. The ski bag holds skis. And then some. Seems like a very very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sawdust maker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of convenience for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Have been super convenient for carrying our skis. We already had boot bags but the boot bags that came with this are perfect for a packing our ski clothes for a weekend. Great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johanns

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. They're solid bags that seem well built. The lack of pockets is disappointing but overall it's hard to complain when it's priced so affordably. Definitely better than going without a bag at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dakoda

customer_reviews.title: Great product- Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters ski equipment. Fits everything she needs.
customer_reviews.author: John Stebelton

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, my son was very happy with both bags and the only thing we added were luggage tags.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J. Pieja

customer_reviews.title: What I expected!
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I expected and everything fits great. Good bags for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: These bags are everything I hoped for. they are ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are everything I hoped for. they are durable. Have extra outside straps that clip together. Handles for carrying. I would purchase again if I need another set.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking, prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so I'll see how it wears but these bags are smarter looking and more weatherproof than I'd expected. The clasps for the shoulder straps are plastic which I don't love, but they seem to be fairly strong, and in general I'm extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: Toby Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Held up great flying across the country. Great for storage too
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. The ski bag can be 'rolled' down to fit my son's smaller ski's and the boot bag is roomy enough to fit the extra's (helmet, goggles, mask and gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Van Sickle

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but after 4 ski trips, there are some serious holes forming already.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but after 4 ski trips, there are some serious holes forming already.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fits two pairs of skis.
customer_reviews.text: What great deal. Bag was roomy enough for two sets of skis so saved me $$ in checked baggage fees!
customer_reviews.author: Saxony

customer_reviews.title: Useful for more than just skis!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a case for a portable ham radio antenna. Keeps the antenna sections together so it's easier to pack it up and carry it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for a different purpose, but great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this for ski. I used this product to store and transport Thule cross bars and mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Kjharris123

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Use for Nordic skis. Can fit 2 pairs and a pair of poles easily. Boot bag with it is nice too. Seems pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: great value for my money
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, great value for my money. The only issue is that since it's an Amazon recommended product, everyone else at the resort / on the airplane / on the bus has the exact same set! Make sure to label your ski bag :)
customer_reviews.author: redfern314

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are on our first trip with them and so far so good. Everything held up good during the flight. Seems to be good quality. There time I love most is I was able to for 2 pair of skis in them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time today. Skis fit fine with ample room for poles. The boot bag is big enough for a pair of boots, and a helmet. Not the most expensive bag, but definitely a good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Erik jensen

customer_reviews.title: can be designed better..
customer_reviews.text: the boot bag is ok, no additonal pockets to store stuff or keep gloves and caps away from the boots. the ski back is decent as well.. the way to adjust the length of the bag to accomodate different ski sizes, can be designed better..
customer_reviews.author: isicamus

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: nice quality bag. My son used it for a lacrosse trip to San Diego. He stored his long lacrosse pole in the bag. It worked really well for him. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality not padded but i dont think that really matters my 2m skis just fit . The clips and handles are well made .
customer_reviews.author: james fieten

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have not traveled yet. Everything is packed and everything fits.
customer_reviews.author: stuart davidson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, a good value. Used it once, held 2 sets of skiis, a bit tight but worked well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far they are lasting well. The ability to adjust the length is very useful. Two different carry handles help when the kids use them. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: smith 1

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good purchase so far. Both the ski bag and boot bag seem to be well built and have held up well. The side pockets on the boot bag are nice to keep my goggles and gloves stored away. It would be nice if the ski bag had some padding, but for the price it really can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Cusma

product_meta.title: Athletico Two-Piece Ski and Boot Bag Combo | Store & Transport Skis Up to 200 cm and Boots Up to Size 13 | Includes 1 Ski Bag & 1 Ski Boot Bag (Black)
feature_bullets: Ski bag fits most ski up to 200 cm in length and ski boot bag accomodates most skis up to 200 cm
Crafted of 600 denier water resistant polyester to keep your skis and ski gear safe from the elements
Padded carrying handles to make your ski luggage easy to carry through the airport, to your car, and up to the slopes when you travel
3/4 length wrap-around zipper to easily slide your skis or other gear such as helmet, ski poles, goggles, pants, and jacket
